A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: as others have stated\, the movie is poorly done. I won't give any spoilers for the sake of others. This is the first time that I got up from a Star Wars movie usually disappointed. This trilogy now seems completely pointless. The story is so incoherent and the legacy of characters from my childhood\, completely destroyed. I have no hope for episode 9 saving this horrible\, horrible series. I would gladly take the prequels\, even though they were mediocre at best\, over this disappointing cash grab.
